name: LCP "21" T SHIRT
description:
Here's the updated number shirt, printed for the 21st Anniversary show.
Left Coast Punk & Jumping Punk on the front.  MxPx, 21 on the back.

Printed on  a Navy Gildan SoftStyle Tee, 100% pre-shrunk cotton.
Sizes limited.

name: MESSENGER BAG
description:
Get one of these babies before they are gone!  Limited number available.  

The Classic 2 design is printed on a large patch and sewn onto the front flap.  Patch is hand screened and sewn at the Arsenal.

Adjustable strap and magnet closure.  100% cotton.

name: MXPX DICE
description: Pair of custom Pokinatcha Punk dice.  Black dice, rounded corners with red engraved punk head.  Die measures 5/8".

name: TUMBLEDOWN PINT GLASS
description:
Serve it up in style..  clear glass pint glass with the TD Sugarskull logo printed on it.

Buy one or buy a set of 2.

name: KIDS MX CLASSIC T SHIRT
description:
This shirt is printed on a 100% cotton Jerzees T.  Red ink on a yellow or medium blue shirt, image is 6" high.

Youth XS = 2-4.  Youth S = 6-8.  Youth M = 10.

name: BREMERTON ORIGINALS - ZIP UP HOODIE
description:
It's back!  Limited stock available.  If you missed it last time, get it now.
Printed on a 50/50 Jerzees NuBlend Hoodie.

name: CLASSIC 2 T SHIRT
description:
Hand screened at the Arsenal on a heather grey Gildan SoftStyle T. Fits like American Apparel.

The second of a series of Classic MxPx designs.

name: I'M WITH THE BAND - BIB
description:
Nice cotton bib, made by Rabbit Skins.  Fastens with Velcro.
Hand screened at the Arsenal.

name: MXPX CLASSIC ONESIE
description:
Dress your baby in the latest MxPx shirt for kids.  We've put the classic design on a nice quality onesie.
Hand screened at the Arsenal.

name: TUMBLEDOWN CD
description:
Tumbledown's first self-titled, full-length release. Label: End Sounds. Release Date: 5/19/2009.

Track Listing:
1. Let's Drink
2. Butcher of San Antone
3. Break out of History
4. Movin' On

9. My Sweet Darling Dear, featuring Jeff Turner (Say Anything)

One size.  These are adjustable.

We went old school and printed this on a pullover hoodie.  The colors in the design have been changed up (Seahawks colors are a coincidence).

It is printed on a 50/50 Jerzees NuBlend Hoodie.

name: PUNK HEAD BELT BUCKLE
description: A slightly smaller version of the custom buckle Mike wore on the cover of Before Everything and After.

name: BOTH ENDS BURNING DVD
description:
"Both Ends Burning" is a film that captures MxPx at a crossroads
in their seasoned career. Directed by Bryan Buchelt, this 
documentary not only follows the band's struggles in the face 
of the new touring climate, it also looks at the legacy and impact
that Mike, Tom, and Yuri have had on the music industry, fellow 
bands, and their fans. 
This is one of the first true looks into the 
life of the notoriously private working class band on the road
and at home. Loaded with special features, the DVD includes over 20 minutes of deleted scenes, and much more. 
"Both Ends Burning" will give you a sense of nostalgia, while setting the stage for the next chapter of MxPx.

Get one today..  only a few left!

name: PUNK BEANIE
description: Your choice of either the red PxPx head logo or the white running PxPx logo.  Knit in design.

name: MXPX CARABINER
description:
Get our Mx Carabiner..  handy for clipping just about anything to anything else..

Never loose your keys again!  Measures 2 1/4" long.

name: MXPX - BOOTLEG DVDs
description:
1. Live at the Fenix Underground, Seattle, November 6, 2004.
This show was on Mike's birthday and they are joined by Tim & Lars from Rancid on a couple of songs.  47 min.

2. Live in Japan at Tokyo, Astro Hall, December 3, 2003
    1 hr.

3. Live in Pocatello, ID October 8, 2008.  
The DVD image is from a signed commemorative poster that goes with this show.. it's also available in the store.  44 min.

4. Live in Europe, February 2006
Paris (56 min)
Barcelona (25 min)
Leeds (3:36 min)
and bonus clip:  Starwars Invasion - Philadelphia 2005 (7 min)

name: ARTHUR- LIVE AT THE MANETTE SALOON - BOOTLEG DVD
description:
Arthur, Live at the Manette Saloon, Bremerton December 2, 2010
 There were only a couple of Arthur shows after the record came out in 2010.  This was for the home crowd.  42 minutes.

name: B-MOVIE DVD & AC/EP
description:
Released by SideOneDummy in 2004.  

The B Movie DVD, along with its accompanying AC/EP CD featuring five acoustic versions of the band's songs-including the brand-new "Grey Skies Turn Blue" and "The Silver Screen"-sums up the band's legacy with a behind-the-scenes glimpse into the whirlwind that is MxPx. The film, directed by Jeff Myers with MxPx, shows them touring Europe and Japan, working in the recording studio and just hanging out. It culminates in MxPx's special three-night stint at Seattle's Graceland last September, where they performed in front of an enthusiastic throng of longtime fans, who sang along with every word. 

The DVD, B Movie features live versions of such MxPx classics as Tomorrow is Another Day, Well Adjusted, Responsibility, PxPx, and Let it Happen. As well as takes fans behind-the-scenes to see what makes the band tick, from confessing their own roles in this dysfunctional, but working family, and answering hate mail from a distraught mom insisting the group is corrupting her daughter to interviews with their rabid followers.

We only have a few copies left.

name: 2 SONG PICTURE DISC 7"
description:
This is an AWESOME 2 song vinyl picture disc with the songs "KEEP A BEAT" and "COFFEE"! 
You might remember a short sample of KEEP A BEAT from our DVD 
"B MOVIE"!   Great artwork! 

No download included with this purchase.

name: MXPX STICKER SETS
description:

1. This is the "anniversary pack".  10, 15 and 20 year commemorative stickers.

2. Renaissance EP, Both Ends Burning and Plans Within Plans stickers.

3. These were previously offered only with the Christmas packages.

name: MXPX WINDOW DECALS
description:
These are made from long lasting (supposedly 7 years) vinyl to withstand everything the weather can dish out!

2. Gas Mask Vinyl Window Decal! Measures approximately 3" x 3".     Limited quantity left.  these will not be reordered.

3. The Broken Bones vinyl window decal! Measures approximately 3" x 2.5".  Start your own Broken Bones car club!        2 for $2.00

4. Panic Bug vinyl window decal!  Measures approximately 3.5" x 2.5". 
This is the last of an old batch..  when they're gone, they're gone.  We're selling them in pairs as they can be a bit tricky to put on.
2 for $2.00

We've got 2 sizes. one says "M-L fits ladies size 6-9" Those are about 10.5 inches long.
Then we've got "LG fits men sizes 9-11.5" which are about 11.5 inches long.

Flip flops, sandals, zorries, thongs..  Whatever you call them where you come from, grab a pair now! Chill out with MxPx!

name: THE ULTIMATE COLLECTION
description:
Spanning their lifetime career with Tooth & Nail records, the MxPx Ultimate Collection covers the best of both New and Old, from their start in small town Bremerton to a National Stage, this is a true collection of MxPx past, present and future.

Released on Tooth & Nail Records, 2008

name: TOO BAD EUGENE
description:
The only band (other than Arthur) signed to Rock City Recordings! This is their debut album... and it rocks!

Produced by Mike Herrera at The Clubhouse in Bremerton, WA. The album is full of guest appearances by members of MxPx and Arthur.

This is one to grab if you like upbeat, melodic pop punk.

Full length. 15 songs!

Released on Rock City Recording Company, 2000

name: ARTHUR - WATCH THE YEARS CRAWL BY
description:

Released on Rock City Recording Company, December 2010

name: SIDEONEDUMMY SAMPLER
description: This sampler came out during the Panic era.  There are 15 tracks and 3 are MxPx songs.  "Young and Depressed", "Arrest Me" and a great acoustic version of "Waiting for the World to End" recorded live in Osaka, Japan.  That song alone is worth the price.

description: Poster is 11x17, printed on nice paper.  Signed by all 4 members of Arthur.

name: BUNNY T SHIRT
description:
Printed on a yellow 100% cotton T. Image is 10" high.  Red ink.
Since these are hand screened there may be some imperfections in the print.

Sizing is as follows: 
Youth XS = 2T.  Youth S = 3T.  Youth M = 4T.

name: 20 YEAR TOUR SHIRT
description:
Limited number available left over from the shows.  Tour dates on back.

Printed on a brown 100% cotton Keya MC150 soft spun T Shirt (compare to American Apparel).
